attributes.action: Make Monday June 21st 2021 a Bank Holiday for all in the United Kingdom.
attributes.additional_details: Help to reinvest in our economy to many of the small businesses that have lost out during the Pandemic. Such as pubs, clubs and restaurants.
attributes.background: To celebrate the start of all restrictions lifting with a National Public Holiday!

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Create a one off Bank Holiday on Monday June 21st 2021.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555205
